content.rendered:
Directed by Sashi Kiran Tikka

Written by Adivi Sesh. Abburi Ravi

Star Adivi Sesh (Sandeep Unnikrishnan). Prakash Raj (K. Unnikrishnan). Revathi (Dhanalakshmi Unnikrishnan). Saiee Manjrekar (Isha). Sobhita Dhulipala (Pramoda). Iftekhar Mahmud (Miiir). Murli Sharma (Colonel Shera). Anish Kuruvilla (Hotel Manager Rodriguez)

Language Telugu. Hindi

Producers Mahesh Babu. Rajiv Bharadwaj. Sheel Nimbalkar. Anurag Reddy. Sharath Chandra. Prathyusha Sharma. Namrata Shirodkar. Tushar Sood

Production A plus S Movies. Adivi Entertainment. G. Mahesh Babu Entertainment
